explains: adv. 错误地；虚伪地；不实地

sentences.en: She smiled falsely at his joke.
sentences.cn: 她听了他的笑话假装笑了。

sentences.en: They smiled at one another, somewhat falsely.
sentences.cn: 他们相互微笑，有点假惺惺地。

sentences.en: Thou wast under oath, and so swore falsely when thou saidst the value was but eightpence.
sentences.cn: 你是发过誓的，所以当你说那值八便士的时候，你就起了假誓。
